item.description:
November's event will be a SUNDAY Meetup.

This month's topic: Those magical words: THE END

Lincoln Street Coffee at the Newton Highlands stop on the Green line D train.

Challenge: Show up! Seriously. This is the challenge.

Agenda:

4:00 Names.

Topic: Those magical words: THE END

How do you put the magic into the ending?

5:00 Break
**Off-topic discussion will ensue after the break.

6:00 Go Home and Write!

group.name: The Boston Science Fiction & Fantasy Writers Meetup Group

item.name: The Boston Science Fiction & Fantasy Writers December Meetup
